adaptive_criteria_management: Flexibly adjust search criteria and scope based on system constraints and available alternatives - maintains progress by focusing on achievable outcomes while navigating platform-specific variations
early_boundary_documentation: Systematically map accessible features and authentication limits early in exploration - establishes realistic scope and prevents wasted effort on inaccessible paths
platform_native_preference: Prefer built-in platform mechanisms and leverage common design patterns - ensures reliability and consistency while reducing custom workaround complexity
multi_indicator_verification: Confirm success through multiple independent indicators (URL parameters, interface elements, data counts) - prevents single-source verification failures and provides comprehensive validation
multi_method_redundancy: Maintain multiple approaches for critical operations (extraction, navigation, authentication) - provides resilience when primary methods fail due to platform variations
proactive_context_management: Implement regular session resets and direct navigation during extended operations - prevents context accumulation and token limit issues for operational stability
comprehensive_element_verification: Verify interactive elements through multiple attributes (tag, href, text, functionality) before interaction - prevents misclicks and navigation errors in complex interfaces
strategic_sampling_prioritization: Focus on primary data sources and representative samples when exhaustive processing is impractical - balances completeness requirements with practical efficiency constraints
technical_resilience_framework: Test critical tools early and implement immediate fallback strategies - prevents single-point failures in technical operations through proactive validation
incremental_validation_progression: Validate each operation before proceeding to complex next steps - prevents error propagation and enables early issue detection in multi-step processes
